transcript.text: What about corruption? How well do you understand what this is?

panelText.text: Corruption is an abuse of trust.
Typically, corruption involves someone using a position of power or influence for private gain, but corruption can occur at any level.
In business, corruption usually takes the form of a payment to a decision maker to make a favorable decision for the person making the payment.
Corruption allegations can damage a company’s reputation for years or even decades. That’s another reason why it’s so important that we all avoid even the appearance of corruption.
